titleStmt.title: A salutation of my endeared love in God's holy fear and dread, and for the clearing of my conscience, once more unto you of that city of Bristol ...
titleStmt.author: Stirredge, Elizabeth, 1634-1706.
Dole, Dorcas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle?,

notesStmt.note: "To you that have been professors of the truth of God in the city of Bristol ..., p. 7-11, signed Dorcas Dole, 1683.
"O Lord! by a high hand ..." p. 12, signed: D.D.
Advertisement in colophon reads: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
